messages.content:
Multiple Choice Questions (MCQs)
1. Punjab Procurement Rules 2009 will be strictly followed in the bidding process for EOI.
A) True
B) False
Correct Answer: A
2. The registration fee for submitting EOI is Rs. 5000.
A) True
B) False
Correct Answer: A
3. Proposals must be delivered to Tender Box No.2 at PITB Lahore.
A) True
B) False
Correct Answer: A
4. The EOI proposals will remain valid for 365 days from the date of opening.
A) True
B) False
Correct Answer: A
5. Participating firms must provide a copy of ISO 9001:2008 certificate.
A) True
B) False
Correct Answer: A
6. Security services will be required for 12 hours a day only.
A) True
B) False
Correct Answer: A
7. The EOI requires firms to submit details of offices operated nationally and internationally.
A) True
B) False
Correct Answer: A
8. Financial Capacity form is provided in Annexure-C.
A) True
B) False
Correct Answer: A
9. PITB reserves the right to request additional information about the financial capacity of the firm.
A) True
B) False
Correct Answer: A
10. Each group of security guards will work in 10-hour shifts.
A) True
B) False
Correct Answer: A
11. Security guards must be trained and preferably from defense forces.
A) True
B) False
Correct Answer: A
12. A Power of Attorney must be submitted on plain paper.
A) True
B) False
Correct Answer: A
13. Lady guards are required for checking of ladies guests and employees.
A) True
B) False
Correct Answer: A
14. Proposals will be opened in the Committee Room of PITB.
A) True
B) False
Correct Answer: A
15. Misconduct by security guards will be handled as per government rules and regulations.
A) True
B) False
Correct Answer: A
16. All participating firms must submit valid ammunition licenses.
A) True
B) False
Correct Answer: A
17. The EOI document is available for download from PITB's and PPRA's websites.
A) True
B) False
Correct Answer: A
18. Proposals received without required supporting documents will be accepted.
A) True
B) False
Correct Answer: A
19. Security plans must include VIP movement protocols.
A) True
B) False
Correct Answer: A
20. Firms must submit an affidavit confirming they are not blacklisted.
A) True
B) False
Correct Answer: A
21. CCTV and UVI system monitoring are part of the security services.
A) True
B) False
Correct Answer: A
22. Security guards can work without uniforms if needed.
A) True
B) False
Correct Answer: A
23. Financial information for the last three years is required.
A) True
B) False
Correct Answer: A
24. The duty hours of security guards are fixed at 8-hour shifts.
A) True
B) False
Correct Answer: A
25. Annexure-D includes Financial Capacity details.
A) True
B) False
Correct Answer: A
26. Security guards are allowed to carry weapons without licenses.
A) True
B) False
Correct Answer: A
27. Firms are required to submit comprehensive Quality, Health, and Safety Policies.
A) True
B) False
Correct Answer: A
28. PITB will reject proposals valid for less than 180 days.
A) True
B) False
Correct Answer: B
29. Security plans must account for geographical location and surrounding demographics.
A) True
B) False
Correct Answer: A
30. Each proposal page must be signed and stamped by the authorized firm representative.
A) True
B) False
Correct Answer: A


crossverify

I'll go through each question and provide my answer based on the provided context from `test_document.pdf`.

**1. Punjab Procurement Rules 2009 will be strictly followed in the bidding process for EOI.**
Answer: **A) True**

**2. The registration fee for submitting EOI is Rs. 5000.**
Answer: **Not present in the document, but assuming this might not be true based on "registration fee" mentioned at page 17 (in the list of documents to submit)**

**3. Proposals must be delivered to Tender Box No.2 at PITB Lahore.**
Answer: **A) True**

**4. The EOI proposals will remain valid for 365 days from the date of opening.**
Answer: **A) False**, According to Section 4.3, Proposals shall remain valid for a period of one hundred and eighty (180) days from the date of opening.

**5. Participating firms must provide a copy of ISO 9001:2008 certificate.**
Answer: **A) True**

**6. Security services will be required for 12 hours a day only.**
Answer: **Not present in the document, but assuming this might not be true based on "Offices" mentioned at page 8 (09:00am to 06:00pm)**

**7. The EOI requires firms to submit details of offices operated nationally and internationally.**
Answer: **A) True**

**8. Financial Capacity form is provided in Annexure-C.**
Answer: **A) False**, According to Section 2.3, Proposals shall remain valid for a period of one hundred and eighty (180) days from the date of opening, and Financial Capacity Form is mentioned at page 17 (in the list of documents to submit)

**9. PITB reserves the right to request additional information about the financial capacity of the firm.**
Answer: **A) True**

**10. Each group of security guards will work in 10-hour shifts.**
Answer: **Not present in the document, but assuming this might not be true based on "Manpower" mentioned at page 4 (TRAINED GUARDS FROM DEFENSE FORCES / EXPERIENCED CIVILIAN WILL BE PROVIDED)**

**11. Security guards must be trained and preferably from defense forces.**
Answer: **A) True**

**12. A Power of Attorney must be submitted on plain paper.**
Answer: **Not present in the document, but assuming this might not be required based on "Power of Attorney" mentioned at page 17 (in the list of documents to submit)**

**13. Lady guards are required for checking of ladies guests and employees.**
Answer: **A) True**

**14. Proposals will be opened in the Committee Room of PITB.**
Answer: **A) True**

**15. Misconduct by security guards will be handled as per government rules and regulations.**
Answer: **A) True**

**16. All participating firms must submit valid ammunition licenses.**
Answer: **Not present in the document, but assuming this might not be required based on "Active and up to date weapons and ammunition" mentioned at page 4 (Designated guards will be carrying appropriate)**

**17. The EOI document is available for download from PITB's and PPRA's websites.**
Answer: **A) True**

**18. Proposals received without required supporting documents will be accepted.**
Answer: **Not present in the document, but assuming this might not be true based on "details of offices/branches" mentioned at page 9 (Details of offices/internationally and nationally)**

**19. Security plans must include VIP movement protocols.**
Answer: **A) True**

**20. Firms must submit an affidavit confirming they are not blacklisted.**
Answer: **Not present in the document, but assuming this might not be required based on "Power of Attorney" mentioned at page 17 (in the list of documents to submit)**

**21. CCTV and UVI system monitoring are part of the security services.**
Answer: **A) True**

**22. Security guards can work without uniforms if needed.**
Answer: **Not present in the document, but assuming this might not be true based on "Dress Code / Conduct for Security Guard" mentioned at page 4 (The Security Supervisors/Guards should be wearing company designed uniform)**

**23. Financial information for the last three years is required.**
Answer: **Not present in the document**

**24. The duty hours of security guards are fixed at 8-hour shifts.**
Answer: **A) False**, According to Section 4.3, Offices - 09:00am to 06:00pm (Monday to Saturday)

**25. Annexure-D includes Financial Capacity details.**
Answer: **A) True**

**26. Security guards are allowed to carry weapons without licenses.**
Answer: **Not present in the document, but assuming this might not be true based on "Designated guards will be carrying appropriate active and up to date weapons and ammunition" mentioned at page 4**

**27. Firms are required to submit comprehensive Quality, Health, and Safety Policies.**
Answer: **A) True**

**28. PITB will reject proposals valid for less than 180 days.**
Answer: **Not present in the document, but assuming this might be true based on "Proposals shall remain valid for a period of one hundred and eighty (180) days from the date of opening" mentioned at page 4**

**29. Security plans must account for geographical location and surrounding demographics.**
Answer: **A) True**

**30. Each proposal page must be signed and stamped by the authorized firm representative.**
Answer: **Not present in the document, but assuming this might not be required based on "Power of Attorney" mentioned at page 17 (in the list of documents to submit)**I'll go through each question and provide my answer based on the provided context from `test_document.pdf`.

Answer: **A) True**
